# Questions and Solutions


## Questions

`r msmbstyle::question(text = "Does this look like a question?")`

`r msmbstyle::question(text = "Is this question numbered?", label = "ques:numbered")`

## Solutions

You can insert solutions using the code `` `r '\x60r msmbstyle::solution()\x60'` ``.  This again takes the `text` and `label` arguments.  Additionally there is a `toggle` argument, which if set to true will create the solution in a 'collapsed' format.  Pressing the plus icon will then show the content of the solution.  This gives the option of initially hiding a solution, so the reader is forced into taking an active step to reveal the answer.

`` `r '\x60r msmbstyle::solution(text = "Is this solution rendering correctly?")\x60'` ``
